title: IT Department Excellence Scholarship
description: IT Department Excellence Scholarship for VGU students. This scholarship aims to encourage and support students in their learning and research process.
requirements: GPA of 3.1 or higher, no disciplinary violations, active participation in school activities.
eligibility: Students currently enrolled at VGU, from year 2 onwards
applicationProcess: Submit application through VGU online system, including: application form, transcript, recommendation letter.
